name: Buckeye State Poll, June 2000
description: This survey focuses on personal finances, with a strong emphasis on perception of the economy. Continues lines of questioning credit card use and debt of any kind, including mortgages, bank loans, and installment loans. Also surveys opinions concerning the future of Ohio, voting behavior, and candidate preference for the upcoming 2000 election. Additional queries into telephone service, level of educational attainment, and political affiliation.
citation: Center for Survey Research, The Ohio State University, 2010, "Buckeye State Poll, June 2000", http://hdl.handle.net/1902.29/D-33516
authors: Center for Survey Research, The Ohio State University
